thread.title: State Dept. to release 7,000 pages of emails, 150 censored
thread.title_full: State Dept. to release 7,000 pages of emails, 150 censored

title: State Dept. to release 7,000 pages of emails, 150 censored
text: State Dept. to release 7,000 pages of emails, 150 censored Monday, 31 August 2015 (6 minutes ago) Department officials said the redacted information was classified in preparation for the public release of the emails and not identified as classified at the time Clinton sent or received the messages. The Democratic president ial front-runner now says her use of a home email server for government business was a mistake, and government inspectors have pointed to exchanges that never should have been sent via unsecured channels.
